messages.subject: Re:The Art of War
messages.msgSnippet: Sure,The Art of War was a well known study in the circle of army leaders in Japan during feudal era.Japan as a matter of fact has adsorbed quite a bit of
messages.messageBody:
Sure,The Art of War was a well known study in the circle of army leaders in Japan during feudal era.Japan as a matter of fact has adsorbed quite a bit of Chinese culture for centuries,in all aspects of society and in most of the cases transformed and adapted those ideas,concepts and practices.
Regards,
Robert


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
